mapper.select: SELECT ID, PriceYear, Name, Specification, TechParams, Unit, UnitPrice, PriceSource, ContractNo, Project, SubProject, SpecialtyID, SupplierAndContact, Memo, AddTime, UpdateTime FROM zc_equip WHERE ID = #{id}

SELECT ID, PriceYear, Name, Specification, TechParams, Unit, UnitPrice, PriceSource, ContractNo, Project, SubProject, SpecialtyID, SupplierAndContact, Memo, AddTime, UpdateTime FROM zc_equip ORDER BY UpdateTime DESC LIMIT #{startIndex},#{limit}

SELECT ID, PriceYear, Name, Specification, TechParams, Unit, UnitPrice, PriceSource, ContractNo, Project, SubProject, SpecialtyID, SupplierAndContact, Memo, AddTime, UpdateTime FROM zc_equip WHERE SpecialtyID = #{specialtyId} ORDER BY UpdateTime DESC LIMIT #{startIndex},#{limit}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM zc_equip WHERE SpecialtyID = #{specialtyId}
mapper.update: UPDATE zc_equip SET PriceYear = #{priceYear}, Name = #{name}, Specification = #{specification}, TechParams = #{techParams}, Unit = #{unit}, UnitPrice = #{unitPrice}, PriceSource = #{priceSource}, ContractNo = #{contractNo}, Project = #{project}, SubProject = #{subProject}, SpecialtyId = #{specialtyId}, SupplierAndContact = #{supplierAndContact}, Memo = #{memo}, UpdateTime = NOW() WHERE ID = #{id}
